title: Choklat
description: As of Feb 2015, the only chocolate maker in Calgary. The store actually manufactures the products in-house choosing every ingredient that goes into the chocolate. Makes a collection of 100% vegan and soy free dark chocolates from imported cocoa beans, plus the sugar has been carefully selected to ensure there is no bone char and is vegan. Has an entire line of 100% vegan hot drinking chocolates as well. An option is you can order online and pick up in store.
